Upsert Document.description: Create a document object and upsert it to a collection with durability options.

Insert Document.description: Create a document object and insert it to a collection, this will fail if a document with the same key already exists.

Replace Document.description: Create a document object and replace a document in a collection, this will fail if no document with the specified key exists.

Retrieve Document.description: Use a key to get a document object from a collection and assign it to a dictionary, this will fail if no document with the specified key exists.

Remove Document.description: Use a key to remove a document from a collection, this will fail if no document with the specified key exists.
